## What is this?
VALORANT rank yoinker (vRY) is a tool that displays real-time rank, headshot %, winrate, peak rank, and loadout info for all players in your current VALORANT match. This release includes a native GUI window powered by Edge WebView2 â€” no browser or terminal needed, just run `vRY.exe`.

## Changelog
<!-- Add changes here before publishing -->
- 

## Installation
1. Download `vRY.exe`
2. Make sure VALORANT is open
3. Run `vRY.exe`

## Requirements
- Windows 10/11
- VALORANT running
- [Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable](https://github.com/abbodi1406/vcredist/releases)

## Notes
- Config is created automatically on first run
- Logs are saved in %appdata%/vry/logs
